mapper.insert: insert into event (EVENT_ID, INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update event set INTERFACE_CFG_ID = #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVENT_NBR = #{eventNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_NAME = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR = #{evtMappedAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_MAPPED_IP = #{evtMappedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE = #{evtProcotolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME = #{evtMappedFunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_DESC = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_TYPE_ID = #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE = #{eventTrigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_EVENT_ID = #{extEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVENT_ID, INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EVENT_ID, INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVENT_NBR, EVENT_NAME, EVT_MAPPED_ADDR, EVT_MAPPED_IP, EVT_PROCOTOL_TYPE, EVT_MAPPED_FUN_NAME, EVENT_DESC, EVT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_TRIG_TYPE, EXT_EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event
